title: HomeStreet's Mason: Bank To Remain Independent For Now (Audio)
itunes:title: HomeStreet's Mason: Bank To Remain Independent For Now (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Mark Mason, Chairman, President and CEO of HomeStreet Bank (HMST), on the outlook for regional banks, amidst a potential rate hike and continued consolidation.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
